Welcome to Plot3D’s documentation!¶

A python library for reading, writing, finding connectivity for plot3d files.

  • GitHub page

This site is built with Sphinx using autodoc so that API reference pages stay sync’d with docstrings and type hints from the plot3d package.

  • Periodicity

  • Split Blocks

    • Splitting Blocks Example
    • Plotting Split Blocks with Paraview
